pr_title: ClassDumper.catchesLinkageError to skip methods without body

timeline.bodyText: what sort of methods are these? abstract? native? If so, I'm surprised we haven't hit this before.
timeline.author: elharo

replies.bodyText: I wrote my investigation in #1352 , which was caused by an invalid class file.
replies.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: I'd bet this is a BCEL error. The doc for Method.getCode even says "Code attribute of method, if any" so I don't think returning null here is a surprise.
replies.author: elharo

timeline.bodyText: would it be cleaner to simply wrap the loop body in if (method.getCode() != null)?
timeline.author: elharo

replies.bodyText: If you ask me, I prefer fewer nested code  (less block indentation).
replies.author: suztomo
